replies.author: DE_SHARK
replies.txt_content:
https://c-t.work/s/43164dcb553044
这是我用的星系mod及前置，目前没有遇到问题

replies.author: 九耀龙翔
replies.txt_content:
尝试关闭更新，.minecraft\config\Galacticraft文件夹core.conf文件
    # Update check will not run if this is set to true.
    B:"Disable Update Check"=true

replies.author: 寒冰之家
replies.txt_content:
星系服务器Update获取未响应导致的客户端连带效果
1.更新星系Mod至最新版本
2.从星系Mod配置文件中
# Update check will not run if this is set to true.
    B:"Disable Update Check"=true改为false
